ARH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Today is one of the worst day in my whole life! My results r poor! And go home kena scolded for unreasonable reasons!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I know i'm being very unfilial to tok bad bout my father but dis cant go on anymore for me! i hate him!!!!!!!!!!! i dun think anyone of u out dere would have a father who wouldn't allow u to bathe in hot water in the rainy season, have a handphone bill of $19 (which only exceeded subscription fee by $4) and doesn't wan to admit it when he's in the wrong!!!!!!!!! He juz blames it on others!!!!!!!! He even scolds my mother!!!!!!!!! I HATE HIM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! If you've got any father liddat, come and tell me coz i dun believe there's a father liddat in the whole world!!!!!!!!!! Life is juz terrible!

it's been 2 days since i published a new blog le .. no time to use .. too bz .. yesterday went to watch the SYF opening ceremony at the National Stadium .. wah .. damn nice lohz .. SJAB contingent march so nice sia .. so neat .. so power-packed .. haha .. shld b the best among the rest ba .. hee .. well, i thought the best part of the SYF is the performance by the 4 diff bands of diff schs .. so nice .. how extraodinary oso .. but so short only lohz .. as in the whole SYF thingy .. shld b longer and more band performances .. den finish le went to west mall to find my other SJAB fwens .. den eat .. eat le go arcade plae para para .. haha .. so pai seh .. but oways got into a quarrel between SJAB and 2 strangers .. haha .. dunnoe y leh .. dese few days damn tired .. oways wan to sleep sleep sleep and sleep .. haha .. b a pig betta ..
